channel.title: Videos on LambdaStack
channel.description: Recent content in Videos on LambdaStack

item.title: Seagate ISE 8TB
item.description: Seagate 8TB ISE HDD NB: Disclaimer - This is not a review. Interesting drive for “deep and cheap” storage I have experience with many drive types. I have had some actually catch on fire in my data center before. When I see an interesting drive I will often review it or simply post about it for future reference for myself. In this case, a future possible reference for self-encrypting drives.

item.title: Red Hat Ceph Object Store
item.description: Ceph Object Store NB: Disclaimer - This is video from Red Hat - not me This video does a good job talking about Object Store. It’s also from Red Hat.

item.title: OpenStack Summit - Austin TX
item.description: Talk at OpenStack Summit in Austin TX. I discussed our new Architecture for our Object Store. I also go into (just a little) why a fully hyper-converged Compute/Storage is not a good idea for large installations.

item.title: Ceph Day in NYC
item.description: This talk was with Chris Morgan and myself at Ceph Day in NYC. We talk about what we’re doing with Ceph and OpenStack and our new multi-petabyte Object Store called BCS (Bloomberg Cloud Storage).

item.title: Ceph Day - Chicago
item.description: Ceph Day - Chicago Ceph Day in Chicago presentation from SlideShare.
